title: Report on Borobudur
brief_description: The Borobudur Temple in Indonesia was built twelve centuries ago. This most important monument of Buddhism and unique work of art is threatened with imminent destruction. International help is needed to save it. This report by Yemi Lijadu and Francine Vande Wiele was based on a film directed by Theo Van Haren Noman.
